biotools.summary:
SoftWipe – a tool and benchmark to assess scientific software quality.

This tool is a follow-up to our work on code quality in the field of Bioinformatics published here. It automatically checks and scores the software quality of your C or C++ program based on several criteria relative to other C and C++ program and calculates a relative ranking of scientific software tools.

bioschemas.name: SoftWipe
